name: Knut Gillis Bildt
obverse: Bust of Knut Gillis Bildt facing left. To the right of the bust is the coat of arms of Sweden with a crown above.
reverse: Two crossed military batons with crowns on the batons. A wreath encircles the batons and inscription in three lines.
description: Knut Gillis Bildt (13 July 1854 – 13 October 1927) was a Swedish Army general and politician.
